description: Number of Hamiltonian circuits on 2n X 6 rectangle.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. G. Schmalz, G. E. Hite and D. J. Klein, Compact self-avoiding circuits on two-dimensional lattices, J. Phys. A 17 (1984), 445-453.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from André Pönitz (poenitz(AT)htwm.de), Jun 11 2003
